member.name: M:VMS.TPS.IdComparison.similarEnough(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determines if two strings are considered similar enough based on a series of checks. This function includes null checks at the beginning to handle potential null values, which is particularly important for interoperability with C# where nulls are more common.
member.returns: Boolean indicating if the strings are similar enough.

member.name: M:VMS.TPS.IdComparison.|HasLeftRightSuffix|_|(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Active pattern to check if two strings are the same but with a direction suffix, such as 'left' or 'right'. This performance optimized version checks for suffix presence and compares the base of the string.
member.returns: Some() if matched with a suffix, None otherwise.

member.name: M:VMS.TPS.IdComparison.|IsBowel|_|(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Active pattern for checking if both strings are variations of 'bowel', including 'BowelBag' or 'SmallBowel'.

member.name: M:VMS.TPS.IdComparison.|EqualAlphaNumeric|_|``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Active pattern for checking if two strings are equal when stripped of non-alphanumeric characters.

member.name: M:VMS.TPS.IdComparison.onlyAlphaNumerics(System.String)
member.summary: Strips non-alphanumeric characters from the input string using regular expressions for improved performance. This method avoids the overhead of manually iterating through each character and using StringBuilder.
member.returns: A string containing only alphanumeric characters.

member.name: T:VMS.TPS.IdComparison
member.summary: Contains functions and active patterns for comparing and processing identifiers.
